ARABIC: وَيُبَيِّنُ ٱللَّهُ لَكُمُ ٱلْءَايَٰتِ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Allah makes the Signs clear to you and Allah is All-Knowing, All-Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: God explains His commands to you clearly, for God is all-knowing and all-wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Allah makes His Revelations clear to you, and He is All-Knowing, All-Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: God explains to you His revelations. He is All-knowing and All-wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And Allah clearly explains the verses for you; and Allah is All Knowing, Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And Allah makes the Ayat plain to you, and Allah is All-Knowing, All-Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And Allah makes clear to you the communications; and Allah is Knowing, Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: God makes clear to you the signs; and God is All-knowing, All-wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And He expoundeth unto you the revelations. Allah is Knower, Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: God explains the commandments to you. God is all knowing and wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And Allah expoundeth unto you the revelations and Allah is Knowing, wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Allah clarifies the signs for you, and Allah is all-knowing, all-wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And Allah makes the Signs plain to you: for Allah is full of knowledge and wisdom.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And Allah makes the Ayat (proofs, evidences, verses, lessons, signs, revelations, etc.) plain to you, and Allah is All-Knowing, All-Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Allah makes plain to you His verses, and Allah is the Knower, the Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: God explains the Verses to you. God is Knowing and Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And Allah makes clear to you the verses, and Allah is Knowing and Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [24:18]   And God clarifies for you the signs, through commands and prohibitions, and God is Knower, of what He enjoins and what He prohibits, Wise, therein.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And He expoundeth unto you His revelations) detailing the commands and prohibitions. (Allah is Knower) He knows what you say, (Wise) regarding the legal punishments He imposes on you.
